dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4200 EH: SBIC Advisers Relief Act of 2014
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To amend the Investment Advisers Act of 1940 to prevent duplicative regulation of advisers of small business investment companies.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the SBIC Advisers Relief Act of 2014.

section.header: Advisers of SBICs and venture capital funds
section.text: Section 203(l) of the Investment Advisers Act of 1940 (15 U.S.C. 80b–3(l)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking No investment adviser and inserting the following:
by adding at the end the following:

For purposes of this subsection, a venture capital fund includes an entity described in subparagraph (A), (B), or (C) of subsection (b)(7) (other than an entity that has elected to be regulated or is regulated as a business development company pursuant to section 54 of the Investment Company Act of 1940).

section.header: Advisers of SBICs and private funds
section.text: Section 203(m) of the Investment Advisers Act of 1940 (15 U.S.C. 80b–3(m)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: For purposes of this subsection, the assets under management of a private fund that is an entity described in subparagraph (A), (B), or (C) of subsection (b)(7) (other than an entity that has elected to be regulated or is regulated as a business development company pursuant to section 54 of the Investment Company Act of 1940) shall be excluded from the limit set forth in paragraph (1).

section.text: Section 203A(b)(1) of the Investment Advisers Act of 1940 (15 U.S.C. 80b–3a(b)(1)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking or at the end;
in subparagraph (B), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; or; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: that is not registered under section 203 because that person is exempt from registration as provided in subsection (b)(7) of such section, or is a supervised person of such person.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives December 2, 2014.
